events.message: The applicant submitted the mortgage loan application for a new property purchase this morning.
The application was reviewed and categorised under Mortgage Loan based on the details regarding house purchase.
Loan officer Sarah Parker was assigned to handle the mortgage loan file for further processing.
Initial review of the mortgage application was completed, confirming eligibility for the requested property loan.
Applicant was asked to provide additional documents, including property appraisal and proof of income.
All requested documents such as the appraisal report and employment verification were submitted on time.
Credit check was completed, showing a good credit score and no major red flags for the applicant.
Risk assessment of the mortgage application was conducted, confirming manageable risk associated with this loan.
An offer containing loan terms and interest rates was presented to the applicant for their review.
The applicant responded positively to the offer and requested clarification about the repayment schedule.
Due to applicantâ€™s questions about repayment terms, the application was escalated to senior loan management.
Senior management approved the mortgage loan application with agreed conditions and repayment terms.
The loan amount was successfully funded and the mortgage disbursement was made to the property seller.
Follow-up call was made to ensure the applicant was satisfied with the mortgage process and loan terms.
The mortgage loan application file was closed successfully after confirming that all formalities were completed.
